title: [Original Art] Star Guardian Lux painting

embed.description: Fan art of Star Guardian Lux from League of Legends! I had so much fun painting this Character concept created by ZeroNis Lux is owned by Riot Games. Star stock purcha...

body:
Just finished this a couple hours ago. Super fun to paint! 
Thank you so much for taking the time to check it out ♥
-Jaleh

**EDIT** 
Check out the process here:
http://jaleh.deviantart.com/art/Process-Star-Guardian-Lux-532374996

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Bear Hat Alice,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=4Tcgqgnn,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-11T17:57:34.049+0000)
>
> This is so great!!!

Thank you for checking it out!! <3
I guess it is her daughter, Sailor chibi moon
I love her hair! This is awesome! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=4Tcgqgnn,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-10T21:57:39.806+0000)
>
> I love her hair! This is awesome! ^-^

Thank you so much for the kind words! <3
I like this a lot more than the real one, great job

> [{quoted}](name=OfficerMcTitties,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=4Tcgqgnn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-10T08:48:23.769+0000)
>
> I like this more than the real one

Thank you so much for checking it out!

> [{quoted}](name=OfficerMcTitties,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=4Tcgqgnn,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2015-05-10T08:51:32.255+0000)
>
> It's really amazing, you're good.

You are very kind, thank you!

she's too girly for a Demacian.

Good work on the face tho.

> [{quoted}](name=TenshouSNK,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=4Tcgqgnn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-10T08:54:13.147+0000)
>
> she's too girly for a Demacian.
> 
> Good work on the face tho.

Thank you Tenshou!

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=4Tcgqgnn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-10T08:58:58.134+0000)
>
> Ouch, her back must hurt.

It's ok, she has been practicing her backbends XD

It's my only criticism, don't worry. I'm not a fan of the pose, because it looks like it would hurt in real life if held for too long. I believe it's called Broken Back Syndrome.

However, I really do like the art. The face and the shading especially.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=4Tcgqgnn,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2015-05-10T09:13:02.568+0000)
>
> It's my only criticism, don't worry. I'm not a fan of the pose, because it looks like it would hurt in real life if held for too long. I believe it's called Broken Back Syndrome.
> 
> However, I really do like the art. The face and the shading especially.

Thank you for the kind words about the piece, and I appreciate the criticism. You are right, it does hurt to hold this pose... I was referencing myself posing in the mirror when I first sketched it.. :P  >__<

Okay, if you were seriously doing this pose (despite the pain) just for reference, then I retract my statement.

You worked for this in more ways than one, and I can 100% respect that. 10/10, amazing art piece, would treat Lux here like a lady and help her save the universe and stuff.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=4Tcgqgnn,comment-id=00020000000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-10T09:46:27.341+0000)
>
> Okay, if you were seriously doing this pose (despite the pain) just for reference, then I retract my statement.
> 
> You worked for this in more ways than one, and I can 100% respect that. 10/10, amazing art piece, would treat Lux here like a lady and help her save the universe and stuff.

Aw well thank you! It's pretty typical for me to pose/reference my own body when doing rough sketches of dynamic angles. Saves a lot of time so I don't have to correct it later on.

Yes Lux deserves to be be respected and treated like a lady! <3 :)

> [{quoted}](name=Jaleh,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=4Tcgqgnn,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-10T09:00:57.267+0000)
>
> It's ok, she has been practicing her backbends XD

Women bend like that because that is the natural position when mating. Now use your imagination and I hope you understand what I am saying. The guy is on the behind, easier for the guy so he doesn't have to bend.
